agenda_items.title: Confirmation of draft Minutes of 39th BOG meeting
agenda_items.decision: Modified minutes confirmed with minor modifications

agenda_items.title: Amendment of NIT First Statutes
agenda_items.decision: Modifications to various statutes approved, including Finance Committee, Building & Works Committee, powers of Director, appointment rules, and code of conduct. Detailed modifications listed in tables.

agenda_items.title: Initiation of recruitment process for faculty members
agenda_items.decision: Recruitment process to start for vacant posts of Assistant Professors (contract and regular), Associate Professors, and Professors after Visitor approval for statutory modifications.

agenda_items.title: Guidelines for TA/DA payment to Non-Official Members
decision: Claims limited to AC-II train fare or actual bus/taxi fare
DA admissible as per Income Tax Rule
TA/DA claim forms to be submitted by non-official members
Payments may be made digitally with Bank account and PAN details

agenda_items.title: Any other item with permission of Chair
agenda_items.decision: Acknowledgement of Dr. Gopal Mugeraya's appointment as Director, NIT Goa; decision to relieve him after handing over charge of NITA.

additional_notes: Minutes confirmed for implementation and progress/status of agenda items noted.
